title: How to Make a Trash Bag Poncho

steps.title: Find a trash bag.
steps.content: Find a trash bag. Preferably, a large thick one. It should be enough to cover your torso. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Use your hands, a knife, or scissors to create a hole in the center middle seam for your head.
steps.content: Use your hands, a knife, or scissors to create a hole in the center middle seam for your head. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Poke your head through to see if you did it right.
steps.content: Poke your head through to see if you did it right. If done correctly, you should be just able to put your head through.

steps.title: Withdraw your head, and make two arm holes on either side of the bottom seam.
steps.content: Withdraw your head, and make two arm holes on either side of the bottom seam. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You can wear this poncho either with your head completely through the hole, or with it just around your face to protect your head.
steps.content: You can wear this poncho either with your head completely through the hole, or with it just around your face to protect your head.
